original: Hanna Kryvolap was born in Kyiv into a family of notable cultural figures; her father, Anatoliy Kryvolap, is a renowned Ukrainian artist, and her mother, Zinaida Vasina, is an ethnographer and researcher specializing in the history of Ukrainian national dress. Kryvolap received her initial painting instruction from her parents and has been engaged in creative work since childhood. She attended the Taras Shevchenko State Art School from
